key_content: Verification of 8 required form component files
Environment limitation note regarding npm/node availability
Instructions for build verification in main repository
Summary table of created files with sizes and timestamps
file_insights.significance: Critical documentation artifact for tracking subtask completion and handoff to QA

patterns_discovered.description: Manual code review was conducted due to inability to execute npm build in sandboxed worktree environment
patterns_discovered.context: Build verification command cannot run due to restricted PATH and unavailable node/npm
patterns_discovered.applicability: Relevant for future subtasks in constrained environments

patterns_discovered.description: Creating detailed verification notes for downstream QA/execution in different environment
patterns_discovered.context: Component files verified manually with clear instructions for final build verification
patterns_discovered.applicability: Best practice for cross-environment development workflows

patterns_discovered.description: All 8 form components created with consistent structure, TypeScript typing, and MUI integration
patterns_discovered.context: Files include types, 6 input components, and barrel export with proper patterns
patterns_discovered.applicability: Established architectural pattern for form component library

gotchas_discovered.impact: Cannot execute build verification directly in worktree
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Manual code review performed; build verification delegated to main repository execution

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: PATH restriction prevents access to nvm-installed Node
gotchas_discovered.impact: Even though Node is installed via nvm, it cannot be accessed in restricted environment
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Document clear instructions for build verification in unrestricted environment

gotchas_discovered.impact: Manual review + automated build verification needed for complete confidence
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Document separation of verification phases and handoff to QA team

approach_outcome.summary: Subtask 5-2 completed with component verification via manual code review

Completed manual TypeScript syntax and import path validation
Verified component pattern consistency with existing codebase
Created comprehensive verification documentation for QA handoff
Documented environment limitations and required follow-up actions
approach_outcome.completion_status: Partial - manual verification complete; automated build verification pending in main repository
approach_outcome.quality_assessment: High confidence in component structure and correctness based on manual review
